name: Gluten-Free Fried Oatmeal Bites
author: ChefEbonaire
ingredients: ½ cup gluten-free all purpose baking flour
¼ cup olive oil, or as needed
directions: Bring water to a boil in a pot; reduce heat to low
Add almond milk and stir in oats
Continue to simmer until oats have reached your desired consistency, 3 to 5 minutes
Remove from heat and let cool, 15 to 20 minutes
Transfer oats to a lidded container, cover, and chill in a refrigerator, 30 minutes to 2 hours
Whisk egg in a small bowl
Place gluten-free flour in a separate bowl
Scoop chilled oatmeal into medium-size balls
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Place oatmeal balls into egg wash until completely covered
Use a slotted spoon to remove floured oatmeal balls; shake off excess flour
Place oatmeal balls into the hot oil and cook until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes on each side
